subject: Greetings. Good News
body:
Greetings. Good News
This email message is from United States Secretary of the Treasury
Mrs. Janet Yellen
Iâ€™m writing this email to inform you that we had a meeting together
with the United Nations(UN)and Federal Bureau of Investigation(FBI)
yesterday being 13th of FEB 2024,in the favor of your Compensation
Funds worth $12.8 Billion dollars at our office in New York.
Attention concerning this your funds worth $12.8 Billion dollars we
have received many report about your funds and we also seen that you
have
paid a lot of money to scammers trying to receive your funds but they
keeping on demanding more money from you because they are all liars
and deceivers
Listen very well, if you can pay attention to me because I Mrs. Janet
Yellen is in charge of your funds now and it will only take you 48hrs
to receive what belongs to you in good faith.
What you have to do first is to stop any communication you have with
those scammers that are texting and emailing you because all they want
is to steal your hard money and runway. I want to inform you that your
fund is now in my custody, So if you are interested in receiving your
funds without any waste of time, then you should get back to me and
claim what belongs.
Almighty God be with you.
Mrs. Janet Yellen
United States Secretary of the Treasury

subject: Re: Greetings. Good News
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite surprising to hear about the funds worth billions of dollars. I must say, it's a bit overwhelming.

Could you please provide more details about how these funds came into my name? And what steps do I need to take in order to claim them?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: Greetings. Good News
body:
Greetings. Good News


*This email message is from United States Secretary of the Treasury*

*Mrs. Janet Yellen*

Attention Dear Friend. I received your email in my office. And I want to
inform you that your Funds worth $12.8 Billion dollars are available in my
custody right now, And you have only 48hrs to claim what belongs to you in
good faith. And the reason why you are receiving this Funds is because your
email address was in the list of scams victims, that is why United Nations
and World Bank P.l.C are compensating 10 people and you are the lucky one
of them.

What you need to do right now is to get back to me with your information to
enable us proceed with immediate effect okay.
1, Your Full Name...
Your Home Address.....
Your Phone No......


Almighty God be with you.
Mrs. Janet Yellen
United States Secretary of the Treasury

subject: Re: Greetings. Good News
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Yellen,

Thank you for your email and the wonderful news! I'm thrilled to hear about this opportunity. It's not every day that one gets an email from the United States Secretary of the Treasury.

I'm curious, how did my email address end up on the list of scam victims? And how was I chosen as one of the lucky ones by United Nations and World Bank?

Also, could you please explain a bit more about this process? What will happen after I provide my details? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: Greetings. Good News
body:
Greetings. Good News


*This email message is from United States Secretary of the Treasury*

*Mrs. Janet Yellen*

Attention Dear Friend. I received your email in my office. So your email
address was in the list of scams victims founded by an online
investigation by the United Nations. And they compensate each one of the
Ten lucky people whose name was among the list  okay.

What you need to do right now is to get back to me with your information to
enable us proceed with immediate effect okay.
1, Your Full Name...
Your Home Address.....
Your Phone No......

Almighty God be with you.
Mrs. Janet Yellen
United States Secretary of the Treasury

subject: Re: Greetings. Good News
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite surprising to hear that my email address was found on a list of victims. Could you please provide more details about how this list was compiled and what the compensation entails? 

I'm also curious about the process moving forward. What steps are involved in receiving this compensation? I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Andrew
